thread.title: Did Deepika Padukone give a look test for Shah Rukh Khan's next film?
thread.title_full: Did Deepika Padukone give a look test for Shah Rukh Khan's next film? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Did Deepika Padukone give a look test for Shah Rukh Khan's next film?
text:
Deepika Padukone 
Word comes in that Deepika Padukone has done a look test for producer-director Aanand L Rai's Shah Rukh Khan-starrer.

Aanand L Rai 
Though names of several actresses have been doing the rounds for a while, including that of Dippy, those in the know say she might be the chosen one. But then Deepika also did a look test for Majid Majidi's Beyond The Clouds, but nothing came of it. Until Rai makes an announcement (the sooner the better), there's no stopping the speculation.
